meanings.sent1: She is so egocentric that she never considers others' feelings.
meanings.sent2: His egocentric behavior makes it hard for him to work well in a team.
meanings.sent3: Even the mirror thinks she's egocentric because it only shows her reflection.
meanings.sent4: His egocentric world is like a bubble that isolates him from everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The egocentric cat only cared about grooming itself all day.

meanings.sent1: Being egocentric, he always talks about himself in conversations.
meanings.sent2: Her egocentric nature makes it challenging for her to empathize with others.
meanings.sent3: The egocentric squirrel hoarded all the nuts for itself, forgetting its friends.
meanings.sent4: His egocentric mind is like a closed box, shutting out the world around him.
meanings.sent5: The egocentric child refused to share toys with anyone else.

meanings.definition: Concerned solely with one's own desires and interests
meanings.sent1: An egocentric person always puts their needs above others.
meanings.sent2: The egocentric businessman only cared about maximizing his profits.
meanings.sent3: The egocentric flower only bloomed for itself, ignoring the bees around.
meanings.sent4: Her egocentric heart is like a fortress, guarding her desires fiercely.
meanings.sent5: The egocentric student only studied subjects that interested them.
